com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components

Class RailState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.controller.components.RailState

  • public class RailState
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a point in time of a Minecart or virtual point moving over rails. All this information is required to properly handle rail logic.

        public RailPath.Position position()

        position

        public org.bukkit.util.Vector railPosition()
